title: The Letter Black (Breaking The Silence) Disography
description:
Discography of Christian Rock Band "The Letter Black" formerly known as "Breaking The Silence". 

Tracklist:
Stand (2007) (As "Breaking The Silence")
Breaking The Silence EP (2009)
Hanging On By A Thread (2010)
Hanging On By A Thread Sessions, Vol 1 EP (2011)
Hanging On By A Thread Sessions, Vol 2 EP (2011)

Genre: Christian Rock/Hard Rock

Release Date: Various

Bitrate: From 192 Kbps to 320 Kbps
